Developer Terms of Use
des:
Infinite Automation develops world-class technology and premium quality automation products. Our products are designed to retrofit existing power setups in domestic and commercial environments to control power switches from anywhere in the world. 
To use this Infinite Automation skill, the users must own and install Infinite Automation products. Comprehensive Information to install and configure products are available at our website www.infiniteautomation.com.au
Below are simple 2 steps to link devices to Amazon Alexa,
1. Search Infinite Automation skill in Amazon Alexa store 
2. Click enable to Use
Or You can link Infinite Automation skill from the Infinite automation application
1. Navigate to the User tab on the Infinite Automation application and click on integrations
2. Enter your Amazon credentials to link Infinite Automation skill.
Infinite Automation skill is uniquely designed and simple to use. After the Amazon Alexa linking process for any infinite automation account, please follow the steps below to use your infinite automation products from Amazon Alexa with voice command.
Once the hardware is physically installed, configured and visible in the devices tab. Please go to device detailed screen. Click on an ellipsis (three dots vertically aligned) on a switch inside the device detailed view. Choose a unique name from the dropdown menu in the voice command field. Now your Infinite Automation skill is ready to use,
To start, just say "Alexa, turn on bedroom light" or "Alexa, switch off living room fan".
In voice commands above, the bedroom is the device name and light is the voice command you have set up in the Infinite Automation application. 
For support, please email us at support@infiniteautomation.com.au.
